Thanks a lot to all those who provided advice!

> for large seed-lists (e.g. 10.000 seeds which is our default crawl-size) 

We also start from about 10,000 seeds, and thus we will first experiment
with the DomainnameQueueAssignmentPolicy strategy.

Best regards,

Marco
